title: Faerie dragon scales
data:
{{version030}} {{flavour|An enchanted suit of armour created from the scales of a rare breed of dragon, now thought to be extinct. This prized relic is now one of the last proofs that the vividly coloured faerie dragons ever existed.}} [[File:Faerie_dragon_armour.png]] '''''Faerie dragon scales'''''
+X [[acid dragon scales]] (ranges from 0 to +8)
[[Acid#Corrosion|rCorr]]
1d3 random properties, with a chance of a negative property as well. These random properties are selected much like the properties on [[randart]] armour, though they are weighted toward being positive, and certain properties have adjusted likelihoods of occurring. The following properties are more likely to appear than average (5% chance of any given property being from this list): *[[HP]] bonus (-10 to +11) *[[MP]] bonus (+1 to +11) *[[Clarity]] ==Desirability== '''Faerie dragon scales'''{{source ref|0.30.1|art-data.txt|375}} are a randomised artefact found only by killing [[the Enchantress]]. Its usefulness is entirely dependent on what the [[RNG]] decides to generate. Don't overlook this armour until you've actually seen its properties. A set of +8 acid dragon scales with rF++, rElec, and Dex+10 is nothing to sneeze at. At the same time, heavy melee brutes will probably find this armour too light to wear. ==History== *Prior to [[0.19]], faerie dragon scales were called faerie dragon armour and the item's base type was mottled dragon armour. ==References== [[Category:Unrands]] [[Category:Body armour]]
